And with her golden shield, she defends all who come under her protection to secure their destiny. As she travels all-round the continents of the universe to bring hope, joy, peace, and unity in the lives and hearts of all who come in contact with her. comments.body: This is a very important artwork, the largest 1-of-1 print I‚Äôve ever created. The original sketches for this piece were sold to a company in London. This artwork holds special meaning for me because it was one of the first where I truly began exploring myself as an artist. During its creation, I spent a lot of time learning and studying Joan of Arc.From the very beginning, I decided the price for this artwork would be set at 1 BTC, no matter what fluctuations happened with Bitcoin prices. Since 2018-2019, the price has always been 1 whole BTC, and it will remain that way. I might add a few more touches to the artwork in the future, but for now, let‚Äôs see where this journey takes it.
